traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The Skyweaver is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells: * Cantrips (at will): blade ward, light, message, ray of frost, shocking grasp * 1st level (4 slots): feather fall, mage armor, witch bolt * 2nd level (3 slots): gust of wind, invisibility * 3rd level (3 slots): fly, lightning bolt

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
